Name: Earth Orbit (6 hours)
Description: Take a quick trip around Earth!

Name: Moon Orbit (48 hours)
Description: Spend two days orbiting the moon and experience what puts the dark in the darkside of the moon while listening to Pink Floyds epic, Darkside of the Moon album!

Name: Mars Orbit (1 week)
Description: Orbit Mars and get upclose and personal with Deimos and Phobos

Name: Jupiter Moon Tour (6 months)
Description: Orbit the biggest planet in our solar system with flybys of Ganymede, Io, Callisto and Europa!

Name: Sizzle with Saturn (1 year)
Description: See the dazzling rings of Saturn with a flyby of Titan!

Name: Entire Solar Tour (2 years)
Description: We will start with a flyby of Mercury and venture out to Neptune in this daring solar system journey! Warning: Possible death. Duration: 2 years - eternity
